title: Can I Use This Name In-Game Without Any Boxes?- NA
body: ßLAÐE is what i want my new name to be. I see those 2 symbols in game sometimes and they arent boxed out such as other symbols. I am using NA server and i wanted to make sure if i can use those symbols in game NA without seeing boxes.

replies.body: Not seeing any boxes in that name myself, so I'm willing to bet it'll work. Be sure to check the list of [**special characters**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814#h1q5) allowed in Summoner Names as well!
